title: DeSantis May Snub Big Tech Inaugural Donations, Strategists Say
description: The Florida governor, who is considering a 2024 presidential bid, has often railed against tech companies. But while turning down their cash would cheer conservative activists, it’s unclear how much is at stake.

title: Herbert Deutsch, Co-Creator of the Moog Synthesizer, Dies at 90
description: An experimental composer, Mr. Deutsch collaborated with Robert Moog to create the first synthesizer to make a significant impact on popular music, launching a revolution in electronic music.

title: GM Unit’s Self-Driving Taxis Are Subject of US Safety Investigation
description: The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration is looking into unexpected braking by cars operated by Cruise, a part of General Motors.

title: Elon Musk Faces Growing Anger Over Twitter Ban of Journalists
description: The suspensions, which were criticized by U.S. and European lawmakers, could raise the regulatory heat on the social media platform — and Elon Musk’s other companies.

title: Sam Bankman-Fried Arrested + Predicitions for 2023 + Listener Q&A
description: The disgraced cryptocurrency mogul Sam Bankman-Fried used “old-fashioned embezzlement,” according to the new FTX chief executive.

title: Elon Musk, Management Guru?
description: Why the Twitter owner’s ruthless, unsparing style has made him a hero to many bosses in Silicon Valley.

title: Twitter Suspends Journalists’ Accounts, Some of Whom Wrote About Musk
description: The social media service, which is owned by Elon Musk, said the accounts were suspended for “violating the Twitter rules” but did not provide details.
